story_teamrocket_02_09000/2401_1201_0200:
You’ve given me enough time to complete
my objective.
story_teamrocket_02_09000/2401_1201_0400:
Bit slow on the uptake, aren’t you. We’re talking
about Dynamax sync pairs!
story_teamrocket_02_09000/2401_1201_0500: What? You became a Dynamax sync pair?
story_teamrocket_02_09000/2401_1201_0600:
Indeed. We’re different from those other Pokémon
that were Dynamaxing spontaneously all
over Pasio.
story_teamrocket_02_09000/2401_1201_0700:
Now I have a Pokémon that will Dynamax
on command!
story_teamrocket_02_09000/2401_1201_0800:
We conducted some experiments of our own
based on Professor Bellis’s research materials,
and now we have the results!
story_teamrocket_02_09000/2401_1201_0900:
I took some inspiration from the sync pairs on
Pasio who wear sygna suits as well.
story_teamrocket_02_09000/2401_1201_1100:
When you wear them, you can feel a stronger
connection to your partner Pokémon.
story_teamrocket_02_09000/2401_1201_1200:
Wait... So you found another Pokémon willing to
accept the malice in your heart, just like
Mewtwo did?
story_teamrocket_02_09000/2401_1201_1300:
Having trouble accepting that? See for
yourself, then!
story_teamrocket_02_09000/2401_1201_1400:
Experience the power of the evil that bonds
us together!
